Flub.Name: Scale
Flub.Description: The scale of the overall field of shapes.

Flub.Name: Collision
Flub.Description: Amount of collision between plates. Higher values create chaotic shapes.

Flub.Name: Slant
Flub.Description: When enabled, adds a second slope to the edges.

Flub.Name: Inverse
Flub.Description: Inverts all sloping operations to 180 degrees.

Flub.Name: Seed
Flub.Description: The randomization pattern or seed for the node's process.
